message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "This report relies on data from the World Bank Enterprise Surveys as well as customs records and field research conducted in the East African Community.", "dataset": ["World Bank Enterprise Surveys"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "In addition to household surveys, we supplement our analysis with fiscal data from government records spanning 20 years, allowing us to examine the effect of public expenditures on poverty reduction.", "dataset": ["household surveys", "fiscal data from government records"], "topic": ["Poverty"]}, {"sentence": "Using a combination of remote sensing data from Landsat, field measurements, and statistical modeling, we estimate the spatial distribution and productivity of maize croplands across sub-Saharan Africa.", "dataset": ["Landsat"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food"]}, {"sentence": "Examining data from the Living Standards Measurement Study-Integrated Surveys on Agriculture and NSSO data, we investigate factors driving the adoption of organic farming in India.", "dataset": ["Living Standards Measurement Study-Integrated Surveys on Agriculture", "NSSO data"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food"]}, {"sentence": "We use several novel datasets, including geocoded firm-level survey data from seven countries and satellite imagery, to explore the relationship between market access and firm performance in East Africa.", "dataset": ["geocoded firm-level survey data from seven countries", "satellite imagery"], "topic": ["Competitiveness"]}, {"sentence": "Using panel data from the PISA study, we relate early childhood education to student achievement and track effects over time.", "dataset": ["PISA study"], "topic": ["Education"]}, {"sentence": "To analyze the impact of climate change on smallholder farmers in Southeast Asia, we use a unique dataset combining satellite data on land use patterns, socioeconomic data on agricultural households, and climate data from historical records and climate models.", "dataset": ["satellite data on land use patterns", "socioeconomic data on agricultural households", "climate data from historical records and climate models"], "topic": ["Climate Change", "Agriculture and Food"]}, {"sentence": "Using administrative data from the National Health Insurance Fund, survey data from the Tanzania Demographic and Health Survey, and field observations, we evaluate the impact of health insurance on household welfare in Tanzania.", "dataset": ["National Health Insurance Fund", "Tanzania Demographic and Health Survey"], "topic": ["Health", "Financial Inclusion"]}, {"sentence": "We combine datasets on international trade and customs to analyze the link between supply chain disruptions and the propagation of COVID-19 in East Asia and the Pacific.", "dataset": ["international trade", "customs"], "topic": ["COVID-19", "Trade"]}, {"sentence": "Investigating labor market dynamics in India, we utilize both large-scale household surveys and a unique dataset generated by monitoring online job postings across various industries and locations.", "dataset": ["large-scale household surveys", "unique dataset generated by monitoring online job postings"], "topic": ["Jobs & Development"]} ]
